metadata.description: A collection of plugins, agents, and skills to ship fast

plugins.name: create-image
plugins.description: AI image generation using the PaperBanana agentic framework — orchestrates specialized agents to research, prompt-engineer, generate, and critique professional-quality images via Nano Banana Pro

plugins.name: dc-due-diligence
plugins.description: Data center due diligence workflow automation — analyzes opportunity folders across 9 domains (power, connectivity, water/cooling, zoning, ownership, environmental, commercials, natural gas, market comparables), synthesizes cross-domain risks, and produces scored executive summaries with Pursue / Proceed with Caution / Pass verdicts

plugins.name: create-prd
plugins.description: Create AI-optimized Product Requirements Documents through guided brainstorming — adaptive conversation that assesses technical level, extracts product vision, and produces comprehensive PRDs with testable acceptance criteria, explicit scope boundaries, and implementation-ready technical detail for any AI coding tool
